and only 2 proxies are working now

n became silent again

foret the ?

like creating premium users who can display adds for example

I am just trying to braistorm different options - sorry for taking your time
what about a Namecoin premium user ?(additional registration fee coming for development) with a minimal decentralized storrage ammount on ZN or maybe other options also(like adds)
this would require a Namecoin hardfork - and would be shurely difficult to convince the namecoin community
Namecoin is a platform which could do more than now, security as part of the triangle (security-anonimity-privacy) should be the same for all, othervise will make a bad echo in the media
higher anonimity could be payable
as carries more attack possibility for the same network
simmilary a scaled decentralization based on same fee could be also acceptable - I think so,but I know this idea is not liked by some in the N community

shtables will not be usable for brutforce
like Cassascius proposed on bitcointalk.org
but this should just an option for those who are aware of the risks
in the concept of Cassascius the private salt is only to make it individual and exclude hashtable
the secret part is against brutforce
which can be enforced with keystretching

most sha256 or pbkdf2 is used
which can be brutforced with asics

question: if I visited a site I will also relay it after, but what happens if the site owner updates his site after my last visit ?
will relay the last site version or I will relay the last visited site version ?
are you shure ?
0net://1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/ is using replace as I see in the site source code but this is not the case for the most sites
It is clear that site update is solvable, but is that a usual behaviour for ZN or just a standard html feature what you can use if you want ?
basxto@zid thanks for the answer, - since Gyurcsány I am not shure, but i speak a lot of languages

if yes than wouldn't be better if general site update would be an option only or at least have a warning ? otherwise you relay something unencrypted which seamed OK when you visited and could have been changed
at least until sites are stored encrypted like in freenet
that may help speed at the moment but how will scale if ZN will be more used and you update hundreds of sites in the background

basxto@zid: but I guess you definitely get problems if you only distribute the last site you’ve seen - getting new versions into the network could be difficult - not necessary, only if the site frequently updates
by a chat room it is necessary - but I am speaking about a static looking site which changes
an old version wouldn't be distributed, it would be only staying locally like a site in a browser cache
of course they are different considerations
but how about only text files getiing updated automatically in the background, media files only by user interaction or somehow limited
what about storing bigger media files(for ex video) in an own common directory in zeronet/data with a hash table of all to avoid multiple storage (by site clone for ex)
of course you can link an external medium, but that wont work if you set a non-working proxy
what about a convergent encryption with hashkeys shared only by thrusted peers ?
a possible feature on ZN, you could eventually create as site specific or sub-network
that could also reduce traffic as not distributed where not necessary
